title: Video: Foals – My Number
content:
I’m not really too sure what’s going on in this new Foals video.

Part anti-drug campaign, part critique of modern society, it’s not too far from the episode of Skins that they appeared in all those years ago (remember that?!). Beginning amidst a normal, semi-pretentious gig environment, it quickly descends into three minutes of hallucinations, trippy visuals and some rather bizarre dancing. Check it out below, and five points if you can spot the members of Blaenavon showing their ugly faces.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
